website_summaries.verdict: The small handle fits well in most average-size hands. Cutting surface is sharp enough for soft, flexible materials like PEX.
pros: The curved head on the top fits around a large variety of tube diameters and guides the cutter to the mark
cons: Plastic construction can feel cheap at times

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: Feels solid and cuts clean and square ! Good cutter for the money !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User_Pf

customer_reviews.title: Did not cut as described.
customer_reviews.text: Not a good cutter for what it is described to do. If you're actually looking to cut in the 3/4" to 1" range, a ratcheting cutter is what you will need, not this.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Cuts Like A Scissor
customer_reviews.text: This worked great! It sliced right through the 1/2" PEX like a hot knife through butter. It cuts like a scissor. The cuts were straight and clean. This is would be fine for cutting in tight places.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: The cutter that cuts
customer_reviews.text: This cutter arrived in perfect time and condition. It really works great on the Pex water line
customer_reviews.author: Eric Collins

customer_reviews.title: Broke all my pex never cut one good!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this item, spend $6 more and get good one
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Eduardo Barreto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for cutting all my plumbing pipes... being a DIY-er, fixer-upper, Jack-of-All-Trades ;).
customer_reviews.author: The King of How To's

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tool, works well on all tubes and hoses. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Tony V

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy
customer_reviews.text: Goes through 1/2 inch pex like a hot knife through butter.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came in handy as I did the plumbing finish work in the cabin my wife and I were building.
customer_reviews.author: RiceStatDoc

customer_reviews.title: A good Pex cutter.
customer_reviews.text: Good for PEX. Not recommended for PVC conduit. Well made and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jack DTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Ok tool for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: Does what its meant to do but is flimsy. Use for small jobs only
customer_reviews.author: Anya and Michael

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Blade is sharp have a hard time cutting pipe with it
customer_reviews.author: marcus h thomas

customer_reviews.title: Right tool for the job.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first experience with Pex. Before buying this, I was trying to cut with a utility knife. Decided to buy the right tool and this works with very little effort. Nice clean cut!!!.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy cutting through the 1 inch pex. Going to make the job a lot easier!!
customer_reviews.author: Yooper 16

customer_reviews.title: Flui-ProPex Tubing Cutter Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I am a retired Industrial Arts/Technology Teacher and purchased this tool for personal use. I was looking for something at a reasonable price for occasional use. I have made a few test cuts and I am very satisfied. Every aspect of the purchase has been great. Highly recommend this cutter and this company.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: These work really well, I was actually surprised at how easily they cut through 3/4" pex. Great for small repair jobs
customer_reviews.author: Arley Schrock

customer_reviews.title: no disappointments,worked great
customer_reviews.text: worked great on my pex install, great price and shipping
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Martin

customer_reviews.title: Pex cutter
customer_reviews.text: Works as described and much cheaper than the big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: dowrh2

customer_reviews.title: Wasted lengths of pex piping with trial cuts before getting ...
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find ta tool with a set up that can cut square including this one. Wasted lengths of pex piping with trial cuts before getting a perfect square cut.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well and am quite pleased with the product and the company.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste money you get what you pay for wasn’t strong ...
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste money you get what you pay for wasn’t strong enough to cut through three-quarter inch PVC not enough leverage.Blade was sharp Only good thing about it now I can use it to cut Pasta.
customer_reviews.author: DO DUDE

product_meta.title: Flui-PRO Pex Tube Cutter - Cuts pex tubing pipe up to 1-inch in diameter (1/4", 3/8", 1/2", 3/4", 1")
product_meta.description:
Ladybug always will be the movie that marked generations with its brave characters and impressive plotline, which is why we have designed an amazing set of toy action figures that can complete your collection or make for a great gift for kids.

Amazing features of this product :

 * New Toy Figures 2019 !
 * The Ladybug toy set includes 6 of the most loved characters on screen.
 * You can make friends Ladybug & Cat Noir relive and recreate their favorite scenes from famous Ladybug characters.
 * These mini figure will spark hours of creative and imaginative play as your small children play with pop Ladybug heroes from long time.
 * Perfect gift idea for kids, developing intelligence when having fun!
 * Your kid will be very happy to play with our action toy figure, specially boys and girls who like Ladybug & Cat Noir.
   Especialy for boy and man.
 * Amazing Set !
   

HIGH QUALITY :

 * The Avengers topper is made with durable eco friendly top quality pvc material.
 * Totally environmental friendly and safe to play with.
   

PACKAGE INCLUDES :

 * 6 Ladybug Miraculous figure toys.
 * 100% new in plastic bag
   

You can create the wonderful memories of movies and comics with your kids together.

Have fun with your favorite movie character!

Click add to card NOW !
feature_bullets: ✅ PERFECT FOR YOUR COLLECTION: If you are super-fan of the Miraculous universe movies, then this amazing set of Ladybug action figures and Cat Noir, as a must-have for your collection! This action minifigure represent deluxe miniature replicas of your favourite movie characters. Have fun and enjoy wonderful minifigure toys that will never get old !

✅ WHAT'S INSIDE: package includes 6 Miraculous Tikki Noir Cat Plagg Adrien Action Figures Toy Kit. The cartoon toppers includes all of your favourite Miraculous Ladybug character, as Marinette, Kwamis, Adrien. This stand figure has a super cool look, that makes action toy-figures very original and real for kids and adults.

✅ HIGH QUALITY: The superhero cake topper is made with durable Top quality non-toxic plastic material. Totally environmental 100% child-friendly and safe to play with. It has vivid colors as white, red, blue, black that won’t wear off !

✅ PARTY MUST-HAVE: One of the best parts about this Miraculous Ladybug figure is that it can be used as cake topper, even party favor, game or décoration for a themed gathering. You can add new incredible figure in small dimension to your kid’s birthday, so it is ideal party favor or gift for an Ladybug themed birthday party !
✅ CUSTOMER SATISFACTION: Keeping you satisfied is our Top Priority! We stands 100% behind our products, offering you a Lifetime Warranty or all your money return back !
